comments.body: This case is almost identical to `fct2hoogle`. Can we share the code here?
Probably going to try and refactor the Hoogle renderer in a future PR.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +107,111 @@classMethod2hoogle :: ClassMethodDoc -> [T.Text]
classMethod2hoogle ClassMethodDoc{..} | cm_isDefault = [] -- hide default methods from hoogle search
classMethod2hoogle ClassMethodDoc{..} = concat
    [ hooglify cm_descr
    , [ urlTag cm_anchor
